sentences.en: A neurotransmitter must be present within the presynaptic neuron.
sentences.cn: 突触前神经元必须存在神经递质.

sentences.en: AIM : To study the changes in the levels of monoamine neurotransmitter in plasma Parkinson disease ( PD ) .
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究帕金森 病患者 血浆单胺类神经递质的水平变化.

sentences.en: All drugs of abuse stimulate the release of the neurotransmitter dopamine.
sentences.cn: 所有的药物滥用都刺激了神经递质多巴胺的释放。

sentences.en: CCK, as a neurotransmitter or modulator, has neuroprotective and neuroreparable effects.
sentences.cn: 作为一种神经递质或调质, CCK具有神经保护和修复作用.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Liver - Qi depression restrain gastrointestinal motion by affecting neurotransmitter of monoamine, gastroelectromyograph and gastrointestinal muscle tensile.
sentences.cn: 结论: 肝气 郁结通过影响单胺神经递质水平 、 胃电以及胃肠平滑肌的张力,从而抑制胃肠运动.

sentences.en: Discuss the cause of these two diseases in terms of their anatomical, genetic and neurotransmitter basis.
sentences.cn: 请就解剖学 、 遗传学以及神经传导物质方面讨论这两种疾病的成因.

sentences.en: Dopamine is a key neurotransmitter, its research history was closely related PD.
sentences.cn: 多巴胺作为一种重要神经递质, 其研究历史与帕金森病发展史紧密相随.

sentences.en: Dopamine is a neurotransmitter critical to the experience of pleasure and desire, and sends a signal to the brain: Pay attention, this is important.
sentences.cn: 多巴胺是一种神经递质，对于人感受快乐和欲望至关重要，而且会向大脑发送这样一个信号：注意了，这很重要。
多巴胺是一种重要的神经传递素。

sentences.en: GABA is the major neurotransmitter used in the globus pallidus.
sentences.cn: GABA是苍白球主要的神经递质.

sentences.en: Glutamate ( Glu ) is the main excitatory neurotransmitter in the central nervous system ( CNS ) .
sentences.cn: 谷氨酸 ( Glu ) 是 中枢神经 系统主要的兴奋性神经递质.

sentences.en: Method Memory score was measured with clinical memory scale and neurotransmitter was measured with ET technology.
sentences.cn: 方法采用临床记忆量表测定老年性痴呆患者记忆分值,利用脑涨落图技术(ET) 测定脑内神经递质的变化.

sentences.en: Neuropeptide Y is an important sympathetic vasoconstrictive neurotransmitter, and play roles with norepinephrine together.
sentences.cn: 神经肽Y是一种重要的交感缩血管神经递质, 与去甲肾上腺素共同发挥作用.

sentences.en: Neurotransmitter receptors mediate signal transduction postsynaptic membrane of synaptic connections between neurons in the nervous system.
sentences.cn: 大脑中神经元突触间的信号传递是由许多神经递质受体介导的.

sentences.en: The brain uses it to make the neurotransmitter acetylcholine.
sentences.cn: 大脑利用这种物质生成神经递质的乙酰胆碱.

sentences.en: The nucleus accumbens is associated with other kinds of longing — for alcohol and drugs — and is more dense in the neurotransmitter dopamine than in serotonin.
sentences.cn: 阿肯柏氏核还与其他种类的渴望（比如嗜酒，嗑药）相联系---而且在血清素里神经传递素多巴胺的浓度更高。

sentences.en: These neurons secrete dopamine, a neurotransmitter involved in the control of movements.
sentences.cn: 这些神经细胞分泌多巴胺, 一种神经传递素介导运动调控.

sentences.en: You ever hear of a neurotransmitter called acetylcholine?
sentences.cn: 你听说过一种叫乙酰胆碱的神经递质 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: [生物] 亲神经的；[生物] 嗜神经组织的
[心理] 神经症；神经衰弱症
神经病患者；神经过敏者
神经质，[心理] 神经过敏症

trans.tran_en: a chemical by which a nerve cell communicates with another nerve cell or with a muscle
